thread.title: Lloyds: An Undervalued Cash Cow in Banking

author: Paul J. Davies
title: Lloyds: An Undervalued Cash Cow in Banking
text:
The headlines for European banks mostly tell a sorry tale, but there is a handful of retail-focused lenders that have become nice little earners for investors.
Lloyds Banking Group is one leader of that pack. The U.K. bank took a massive bailout during the financial crisis and has been paying out billions in compensation for improperly...
